meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unclear or indistinct.
meanings.sent1: The haziness of the photo made it hard to recognize the people.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to see through the haziness of the foggy morning.
meanings.sent3: The haziness of his memory made him forget where he parked his car.
meanings.sent4: The haziness of the situation clouded her judgment.
meanings.sent5: The haziness of the dream left her feeling disoriented.

meanings.definition: A lack of clarity or sharpness in perception or understanding.
meanings.sent1: The haziness in his explanation confused the students.
meanings.sent2: The haziness of the instructions led to many mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The haziness of the map made them take the wrong turn.
meanings.sent4: The haziness of her thoughts made it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The haziness of the concept left everyone puzzled.
